title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 9
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Rina-chan, can I have an interview for the upcoming Shuffle Festival?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Sure. You can ask me anything. Rina-chan’s board「Determined」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Then, please tell us about what you’re looking forward to or what you’re working hard on right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m looking forward to.... being able to sing everyone’s songs. I’ve been practicing a lot while thinking about them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. It’s great to be able to sing everyone’s songs after all, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. Whenever I sing them.... I would feel the same feeling. I feel like I.... connected more and more with everyone. And I would like for this feeling of connection.... to reach the people who support me too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s very like you, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you. Rina-chan’s board「Embarrassed」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, do you want to practice together after this? Hearing your interview makes me want to practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah, sure. Let’s do our best.... for the final stretch. Rina-chan’s board「Woo!」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
